resources.string: What is the objective of Within Reach?
This Android app and an accompanied computational server which calculate and show to the user a reachable zone on the map given starting location and amount of travel time.
In order to drop a pin on the map, please long hold your desired location and a pin will appear
Adjust the time by navigating into the settings and selecting your desired time span.

There are three different transportation modes, a user is free to select one, two, or all three at one given time. To enable a transpostation mode, enter the settings menu and click on the desired mode
